title: ATP World Tour 250, Buenos Aires Men's Singles Final Rounds and Seeds Progress
text: February 17, 2018 / 2:18 AM / Updated an hour ago UPDATE 10-ATP World Tour 250, Buenos Aires Men's Singles Final Rounds and Seeds Progress Reuters Staff 4   Final Rounds and Seeds Progress   250, Buenos Aires   Final Rounds .. Seed Round Rslt Opponent Score 1 Dominic Thiem (AUT) semi won Gael Monfils (FRA) 6-2 6-1 qtr won Guido Pella (ARG) 7-6(7) 6-4 2nd won Horacio Zeballos (ARG) 6-4 6-3 1st won (Bye) - Gael Monfils (FRA) semi lost 1-Dominic Thiem (AUT) 6-2 6-1 qtr won Leonardo Mayer (ARG) 6-4 3-6 6-3 2nd won Dusan Lajovic (SRB) 6-4 6-3 1st won 7-Pablo Cuevas (URU) 6-1 6-4 - Aljaz Bedene (SLO) semi won Federico Delbonis (ARG) 6-4 2-6 6-1 qtr won 5-Diego Schwartzman (ARG) 6-4 6-4 2nd won 3-Albert Ramos-Vinolas (ESP) 3-6 7-5 6-1 1st won Jiri Vesely (CZE) 6-0 6-3 - Federico Delbonis (ARG) semi lost Aljaz Bedene (SLO) 6-4 2-6 6-1 qtr won Guillermo Garcia-Lopez (ESP) 6-3 7-5 2nd won Gastao Elias (POR) 7-6(5) 7-6(6) 1st won Florian Mayer (GER) 7-6(4) 6-4 - Guido Pella (ARG) qtr lost 1-Dominic Thiem (AUT) 7-6(7) 6-4 2nd won 8-Fernando Verdasco (ESP) 6-2 6-4 1st won Nicolas Kicker (ARG) 2-6 6-4 6-4 - Leonardo Mayer (ARG) qtr lost Gael Monfils (FRA) 6-4 3-6 6-3 2nd won 4-Fabio Fognini (ITA) 6-3 6-3 1st won Rogerio Dutra Silva (BRA) 6-7(4) 6-2 6-4 5 Diego Schwartzman (ARG) qtr lost Aljaz Bedene (SLO) 6-4 6-4 2nd won Thomaz Bellucci (BRA) 3-6 6-3 6-2 1st won Andreas Haider-Maurer (AUT) 6-4 6-3 - Guillermo Garcia-Lopez (ESP) qtr lost Federico Delbonis (ARG) 6-3 7-5 2nd won 2-Pablo Carreno Busta (ESP) 7-6(5) 1-6 7-6(6) 1st won Carlos Berlocq (ARG) 6-3 6-3 ..
